title: Hobbit Sword-play (2U103)
text:
Set:	Mines of Moria
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Shire
Twilight:	0
Card Type:	Event
Game Text:	Maneuver: Exert a Hobbit bearing a weapon to wound a minion. That minion's owner may remove (3) to prevent this.
Lore:	Boromir sensed that a blade in a Halfling's hand would surprise a larger foe.
Rarity:	U
